At first, Gu Jiu Si does not like Liu Yu Ru, believing her to be calculating and scheming.

programme.title: Like Father, Like Daughter - EP 8

In the end, Chunchun has to be transferred from school to school as a result of disciplinary problems. Notwithstanding this, Jingang still has high hopes for his daughter - that she will embark on a successful career, either as a doctor or lawyer.

programme.title: Double Happiness 2 - EP 51

Faced with such fierce competition, can the squabbling Luo siblings bring the family business back to life and put their own lives in order?

programme.title: Ninaithale Inikkum - EP 1079
programme.desc: Bommi, an innocent girl from a lower middle classfamily in a village travels to city daily to sell her delicious sweets in simple two wheelerand there she meets a family where the head, Dheivanayagamwho has already great recognition in the sweets industry. _x000D_Bommigets close to the family and fate gets her married to his grand son who has no interest her. The evolving of the love between them forms the rest of the story

programme.title: Anna - EP 514

programme.title: Valliyin Velan - EP 46
programme.desc: The story primarily follows Roopa's journey as she grapples with her politician father's rejection, but finds solace and support in Raju, her father’s most trustworthy PA and their protector. Despite deception from the manipulative schemes of her aunt, Ambika, Roopa strives to safeguard her family's legacy while unexpectedly falling for Raju along the way.

programme.title: Karthigai Dheepam - EP 656

programme.title: Nenjathai Killadhe - EP 97
programme.desc: Goutham, a business tycoon who appears overweight, enters into a marriage of convenience with Bhoomika, an educated middle-class woman. programme.title: L'ete Des Chaleurs
programme.desc: On a hot summer's day, a mother needs a break and a child needs to exist.

programme.title: Avant-Garde
programme.desc: 1984, the French-German border. A gallery owner from Berlin is carrying with him a flagship sculpture of his collection to present it in a major exhibition. But on seeing the object, the French customs officer is hesitant: is it really an artwork?

programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Chateau ! - EP 2
programme.desc: Over a million visitors each year, 282 chimneys, 77 staircases, a total of 400 rooms: the Chateau de Chambord is on everyone's bucket list! In Sologne, the Chateau de la Ferte Saint-Aubin was designed to control river traffic and thus protect the royal city of Chambord.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1470
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Courants D'est - EP 14
programme.desc: We visit the Chalons-en-Champagne National Centre for Circus Arts, the most illustrious of France's circus schools. Peggy Donck, director, is the first woman to have been appointed at the head of this training centre. Coming from all around the world, 300 artists train here annually, each according to their discipline.

programme.title: Femmes Des Bois
programme.desc: A foray into the unique world of the logging camps, where men and women from very different backgrounds live and work together. Through the eyes of women who have chosen to work in the timber industry, we discover a microcosm of society as each forestry season follows the last.

programme.title: Le 6h00 Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.desc: Presenting the next day of the French football championship.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Pompon Ours - EP 25
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. He might be mischievous but he has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: Pompon Ours - EP 26
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. He might be mischievous but he has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: Koka Kitoumbou - EP 8
programme.desc: Malisha, age 10, accompanied by Rikitou, her little woollen doll, heads off for fabulous adventures in search of the Koka Kitoumbou stone. No ordinary stone, it has magical properties and amazing powers, notably that of turning whatever it touches into sweet treats.

programme.title: Toc Toc ! - EP 10
programme.desc: Whenever an animal is stressed or bothered about something, they head straight to see Claude the bull. Well-known as a doctor for minor ills, he is particularly skilled in soothing everyday troubles and resolving misunderstandings. With Claude's help, the animals learn to love themselves as they are: imperfect.

programme.title: Les Mutants - EP 9
programme.desc: Tom and Leo are trying to come up with a way to tell Lucie of their plans to move, as gently as possible. But the latest events increase everyone's stress levels and give them plenty to keep them occupied...

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Les Quatre Coins De L'assiette - EP 2
programme.desc: On Prince Edward Island, chef Robert Pendergast prepares pork with organic vegetables and clams, all cooked in a traditional wood-fired oven.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil

Through its exclusive investigations and in-depth reports, ''Mise au Point'' tackles a wide range of topics: politics, economics, social issues, sports, culture and new trends.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Marianne - EP 3
programme.desc: A young volunteer fire-fighter is found dead in the midst of the forest fire, his colleague unable to save him from the flames. But evidence of blows to the victim's body raises Marianne's suspicions and she rapidly discovers there was no shortage of conflict within the local fire brigade.

programme.title: Marianne - EP 4
programme.desc: An actor employed for an escape game is murdered during a session. A player had fired at him with a rifle supposedly loaded with blanks: they had deliberately been replaced by live ammunition. Marianne tries to understand exactly what everyone was up to within the company.

programme.title: La Peinture Francaise Autour Du Monde - EP 2
programme.desc: In Saint Petersburg, Russia, the Hermitage Museum houses the world's largest collection of paintings: over sixteen thousand works. Spectacular rooms cover all the major art movements of the modern period, from impressionism to abstract, with canvases by Monet, Renoir, Cezanne, Seurat, Van Gogh and Derain, amongst others...

programme.title: Complement D'enquete - EP 17
programme.desc: A current affairs investigation magazine taking its theme from current headlines and alternating film reports and studio guests.

programme.title: Geopolitis - EP 9
programme.desc: Analysis, explanations, neutrality... ''Geopolitis'' offers an unbiased in-depth look at international current affairs, with accuracy, precision and a constant desire to make an increasingly complex and conflictual world easier to understand.

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 22
programme.desc: The French may be travelling more, but not in the same way as before: Eluxtravel offers made-to-measure experiences. All about the French expression ''faire greve'' (to go on strike). Moulins, in the Allier, is renowned for its artisanal glass and textile production. Wearing a headscarf on the catwalk.

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 28
programme.desc: Open arms and contagious smiles, if Cambodia offers innumerable beauty spots to discover, such as the incredible Angkor temples, it is without doubt its people who are its greatest treasure. But if the country is increasingly open to tourists, the painful history of its past remains ever-present.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 21
programme.desc: The Villele Museum covers the history of Reunion Island and of slavery in the 18th century. From minuscule to immense, Gregoire Scalabre sculpts and assembles, plunging us into a different dimension. Marine Serre: the 2025 spring-summer collection, veritable message of love. Severine and Christophe, manufacturing Basque knives.

programme.desc: In Africa, Mali has always been an example of religious tolerance and peaceful cultural co-existence. But since 2012, new fears have been spreading like gangrene across the country. Through the private lives of two Muslim-Christian couples, ''Noces Maliennes'' lifts the veil on a paradise that is rapidly changing.

programme.title: Il Etait Une Fois... Ces Droles D'objets - EP 41
programme.desc: Watches, speakers, toilets... Maestro takes a fascinating look at some of our most everyday objects, both old and new. How exactly to they work? What is their history?

programme.title: L'agence Galactique - EP 17
programme.desc: Specialist in every type of breakdown, Agence Galactique travels the galaxy to assist its customers. Aboard their spaceship Toaster, Dany Oven, Apple and Zed work wherever they're needed sorting out inhabitants' problems in their own inimitable way: happy, cheerful and totally eccentric.

programme.title: L'imagier Anime De Koumi - EP 16
programme.desc: At 6 years old the cheerful mischievous Koumi dreams of knowing all the animals in the world. Thanks to her picture book, she's able to head off and meet them.

programme.title: Taffy - EP 47
programme.desc: Wealthy Mrs. Muchmore lives in a manor with her beloved dog Bentley. One day, Scraggs the raccoon turns up disguised as a cat. Immediately adopted by the old lady, he becomes Taffy and laps up her attention. But Bentley is not fooled and decides to chase him off his territory.

programme.title: Kididoc - EP 25
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Kididoc - EP 26
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Nubu Et Yara - EP 18
programme.desc: Young Nubu is a little boy who's curious about everything but makes one blunder after another as he learns about life. Fortunately his wiser more responsible older sister, Yara, always has the time to explain things, offering the perfect opportunity for Nubu to dive into his own comic book world.

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Ages - EP 18
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Dessine-Moi Les Etoiles - EP 1
programme.desc: Science explained by cartoon artist Fiami, through questions asked by two children. Further explanations from a philosopher and an astronomer help popularize science and envision it as a great human adventure.

programme.title: Quasimodo - EP 12
programme.desc: Paris, 1483. 16-year-old Quasimodo is a hunchbacked orphan. One day, the gypsy Esmeralda, with whom he is in love, finds herself in trouble. He sacrifices himself to save her and ends up in prison. And so begins a long series of adventures...

programme.title: Pfffirates - EP 4
programme.desc: On the island of Calypso, Captain Lamar is busy training his crews in the art of pfffiracy. Between lessons in navigation, treasure hunts and boarding other ships, it's a busy programme for everyone. But it'll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: 7 Jours - EP 9
programme.desc: '7 jours'', a weekly magazine programme covering news on society and international events to know all there is to know... in French

programme.title: Falò
programme.desc: A news magazine show, ''Falò'' discusses and analyses current affairs in depth.

programme.title: Objectif Monde L'hebdo - EP 34
programme.desc: Orcas and their incredible ingenuity fascinate scientists. Closely related to dolphins, living in groups, these apex predators possess a collective intelligence that is beyond us and their own verbal language: 24 different sounds have been recorded that constitute the basis of their phonetics, enabling them to pronounce around 60,000 words.

programme.title: Compagnons D'arbres - EP 10
programme.desc: Injuries and fatigue are quickly forgotten, replaced by an overwhelming feeling of pride. Beyond each person's own thoughts and conclusions, the adventure has created durable links between everyone, a veritable fellowship of the trees...

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Cote d'Azur.

programme.title: #Helvetica
programme.desc: What values are dear to the heart of Switzerland's most influential figures? How do they see the country, its know-how and its successes? We meet some of those taking Switzerland to the top in the fields of economics, politics, science, culture...

programme.title: Rassemblance - EP 10
programme.desc: Born in Connecticut of an American father and Canadian mother, Chloe moved to France to continue her education in an international school. Today aged 25, the student in political sciences defines herself as an activist and represents the younger members of the volunteer-based organisation Democrats Abroad France.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match
programme.desc: A key figure from the world of sport looks back at a particular competition, a career, an outstanding moment.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: 400 Millions De Critiques - EP 10
programme.desc: The first major cultural magazine for the French-speaking world, an original TV5MONDE concept, ''400 millions de critiques'' (400 million critics) reviews French-speaking cultural news through the viewpoints of Belgian, Swiss, Canadian, Quebecker, and French journalists.

programme.title: Sur Le Front - EP 25
programme.desc: Whilst many French are convinced that their rubbish tips will one day disappear, the reality of the situation is very different: twenty percent of all household waste still goes to landfill, some 17 million tonnes every year. We explore the hidden side of France's waste management industry.

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 23
programme.desc: Elegant lines and high quality materials: Caran d'Ache is a benchmark when it comes to drawing and writing. Did you know that muslin takes its name from an Iraqi city? At Longwy, skilled craftsmen showcase the beauty of enamel. How to wear a leather coat.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 22
programme.desc: Pau, today home to a museum dedicated to Henri IV. Designer and interior designer, Chloe Negre creates colourful spaces bringing the beauty of handiwork and craftsmanship to life. Celebrating his brand's 10th anniversary, Charles Jeffrey presents a runway show centred on utility. Denis Tomasina restores old clocks.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion

programme.desc: A major interview focusing on world news, proposed by TV5MONDE.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal

programme.title: Johnny Hallyday Symphonique
programme.desc: It was a project Johnny Hallyday had long dreamed of during his lifetime: associating his songs with a symphonic orchestra. His artistic director, Yvan Cassar, has now made it reality. The singer's voice and videos are projected, accompanied by the philharmonic orchestra and choir of the Nice Cote d'Azur Opera.

programme.title: La Peinture Francaise Autour Du Monde - EP 5
programme.desc: The Los Angeles County Museum of Art, LACMA, is the largest museum in western America. From the end of the 19th century, American artists came to stay in France, drawn by the Cubist and abstract movements. Monet, Renoir, Cezanne, Gauguin, Van Gogh, Braque, and Kandinsky were their masters.

programme.title: Flashs
programme.desc: Seven year-old Judith has been kidnapped. Mathilde heads the investigation with her new team. When the prime suspect is arrested, Mathilde is flabbergasted: it's none other than her mother, to whom she hasn't spoken in months. Claiming to be a medium, her mother says she's had visions concerning the case.

programme.title: Movie - Nilaa Kaalam

programme.title: FS MMA Mariusz Pudzianowski vs. Michal Materla
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS MMA returns with more action from KSW 70 in Poland, with a main event featuring two top heavyweights, strongman superstar Mariusz Pudzianowski and hard-hitting Michal Materla. With all of the power on display in this one, this bout won't make it to the final bell. Two Light Heavyweight co-features complete the card on this episode of FIGHT SPORTS MMA.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Jermain Taylor vs. Kelly Pavlik
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features Jermain 'Bad Intentions' Taylor (27-0, 17 KOs) making the 5th defense of his WBC and WBO Middleweight Titles, this time against upstart Kelly 'The Ghost' Pavlik (31-0, 28 KOs) on September 29, 2007 at Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: 100 finalists from across the country congregate on the Las Vegas strip for the American Ninja Warrior finals. This course consists of four stages to test the contestants' strength, speed and agility. In front of the finish line stands the massive metal monster, Mount Midoriyama with its daunting 77-foot Rope Climb. Can any of the contestants complete the challenges presented by The World's Most Difficult Obstacle Course? Part 3 of 5

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Travis Walker vs. Chris Arreola
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a battle among heavyweights as Travis Walker faces the then-undefeated Chris Arreola, who was ranked in the top 10 by four of the boxing organizations. While the fight seems to go to one side after the opening bell, the momentum quickly shifts.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 2 featuring Shodai, Kagayaki, Mitakeumi and Tochiozan from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 4 of 4.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode follows former UFC welterweight champion Matt Serra around his hometown in New Jersey for a look at the lighter side of this intense competitor. Ring girl Natasha Wicks shows us that the fighters aren't the only ones with the big guns. Plus a behind the scenes look at the UFC Fan Expo and an interview with MMA legend Chael Sonnen.

This episode features Jermain 'Bad Intentions' Taylor (27-0, 17 KOs) making the 5th defense of his WBC and WBO Middleweight Titles, this time against upstart Kelly 'The Ghost' Pavlik (31-0, 28 KOs) on September 29, 2007 at Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: 100 finalists from across the country congregate on the Las Vegas strip for the American Ninja Warrior finals. This course consists of four stages to test the contestants' strength, speed and agility. In front of the finish line stands the massive metal monster, Mount Midoriyama with its daunting 77-foot Rope Climb. Can any of the contestants complete the challenges presented by The World's Most Difficult Obstacle Course? Part 3 of 5

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Travis Walker vs. Chris Arreola
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a battle among heavyweights as Travis Walker faces the then-undefeated Chris Arreola, who was ranked in the top 10 by four of the boxing organizations. While the fight seems to go to one side after the opening bell, the momentum quickly shifts.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 2 featuring Shodai, Kagayaki, Mitakeumi and Tochiozan from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 4 of 4.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode follows former UFC welterweight champion Matt Serra around his hometown in New Jersey for a look at the lighter side of this intense competitor. Ring girl Natasha Wicks shows us that the fighters aren't the only ones with the big guns. Plus a behind the scenes look at the UFC Fan Expo and an interview with MMA legend Chael Sonnen.

programme.title: FS MMA Mariusz Pudzianowski vs. Michal Materla
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS MMA returns with more action from KSW 70 in Poland, with a main event featuring two top heavyweights, strongman superstar Mariusz Pudzianowski and hard-hitting Michal Materla. With all of the power on display in this one, this bout won't make it to the final bell. Two Light Heavyweight co-features complete the card on this episode of FIGHT SPORTS MMA.

programme.title: WCCB Jaron Ennis vs. Karen Chukhadzhian
programme.desc: As Jaron 'Boots' Ennis prepares for his IBF Welterweight World Title defense on July 9th, FIGHT SPORTS relives some of his career highlights. Here we see Ennis in a match-up with that title on the line, taking on 21-1 Karen Chukhadzhian at Capital One Arena in Washington. Ennis enters the bout at 29-0, cementing himself as one of boxing's rising stars with recent knockout victories over the likes of Thomas Dulorme and Sergey Lipinets.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Vinny Pazienza vs. Gilbert Dele
programme.desc: In this episode, we see 'The Pazmanian Devil' Vinny Pazienza in front of his hometown crowd in Providence, Rhode Island, taking on undefeated WBA Super Welterweight World Champion Gilbert Dele of France. The raucous crowd was firmly in favor of its local hero, cheering him on as he looked to win his second World Title, having lost the first one to Greg Haugen three years earlier.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Keith Thurman vs. Carlos Quintana
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is the undefeated Keith Thurman taking on Carlos Quintana. Also on the card, kickboxing super heavyweight legend Daniel Ghita faces off against Brice Guidon.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Asanoyama, Tochiozan, Hokutofuji and Ishiura from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Anass Aaras vs Andre Estevao
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. It's kickboxing's most talented athletes at their finest! This episode, from Eindhoven, the Netherlands, features main event Anass Aaras (Morocco) vs. Andre Estevao (Angola).

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Garreth McLellan vs. Brendan Lesar
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of the interim Middleweight Championship as Garreth 'SoldierBoy' McLellan and Brendan 'Descendant' Lesar meet in the hexagon. Bonus coverage includes Matunga Djikasa vs. Ivan Strydom and Devon Cronje vs. Guy Mongambi.

programme.title: WCCB Jaron Ennis vs. Roiman Villa
programme.desc: From Atlantic City, undefeated rising star Jaron 'Boots' Ennis will defend his Interim IBF Welterweight World Championship against the biggest puncher he has faced so far in his career, Roiman Villa. Ennis is a fixture on many lists of the future superstars of the sport, expected to be one of boxing's best fighters. He will need to get passed Villa, who has 24 knockouts in his 27 professional fights. It's Ennis vs. Villa, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Shane Mosley
programme.desc: This episode features Floyd Mayweather, Jr. taking on Shane Mosley in a welterweight title bout, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the Hohhot Grand Prix, and stop to get to know the world's #1 ranked fighter Aleksandar Kukolj. We then head to Russia to witness the effect that Judo has on the Russian people.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! James Kirkland vs. Eromosele Albert
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is the 21-0 James Kirkland facing off with the 21-1 Eromosele Albert. Just a little over a minute into this bout, following a combination of punches, the bout comes to a close.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 69
programme.desc: The Teletubbies eat lots of Tubby Toast and make a huge pile of crumbs. Luckily, The Noo-Noo is on hand to clean up.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S6) - EP 8
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'frog', and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see green, brown, hopping and croaking frogs, and one with a really long tongue!

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: A new museum opens, so Zip and his friends try to find a fossil for the display.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 34
programme.desc: Lofty has a broken finger, so Mustard goes in search of help. Messy and friends save the day and discover that bones are amazing.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 69
programme.desc: When Gran tells Monty that good things come to those who wait, he wonders how it could possibly be better to wait for something than to have it right away.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 28
programme.desc: It's Bluey's first trip to the cinema, but she's worried the movie will be too scary. When Bingo starts running amok in the theatre, she must conquer her fear and help Dad out.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 21
programme.desc: After finding out that Mr Wobbly is visiting next Monday, the Squirrels impatiently want to know how long that means they need to wait.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 20
programme.desc: As Peggee and the Hummingbirds journey up the river to deliver a parcel, they have fun spotting and avoiding the wildlife that they meet along the way.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 19
programme.desc: Chipmunk is cycling one day delivering his packages when he hits a rock and his trike falls apart! He has so many packages to deliver - what is he going to do now?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 17
programme.desc: Glitch wants to ski, so the Grimbots give Table Mountain a snowy peak, which threatens its rare plants.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 16
programme.desc: When Grandmaster Glitch makes popcorn in Mount Etna, Italy, he blocks the volcano and endangers farms on its slopes.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 1
programme.desc: After Dad eats her last chip, Bingo is given three chances to put Mum and Dad in "Dance Mode" as payback. But the others can't resist taking Bingo's turns for her.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 51
programme.desc: When Mum goes out to a baby shower, Dad takes charge of the girls' evening routine. But with Bluey missing Mum, Dad has to pull out all the games he knows to keep them entertained.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures (S1) - EP 39
programme.desc: Andy heads to Africa in his safari-mobile to film the courtship dance of a male Jackson's widowbird.

programme.title: Ranger Hamza's Eco Quest (S1) - EP 20
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how buzzards play such an important role in the environment.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S7) - EP 1
programme.desc: In this episode Captain Captain returns to her beloved Scarlet Squid (much to the surprise of Gem) and has brought along two brand new pirates, Sandy and Seaweed, to help win those jewels back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 48
programme.desc: Gerbie the snake is on holiday and would like to see all the sights. Duggee can help!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 47
programme.desc: Chipmunk has a parcel for Duggee, wrapped up like a present. Maybe it's Duggee's birthday!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 46
programme.desc: The squirrels are playing in the clubhouse when Naughty Monkey arrives and causes chaos!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Four adventure-seeking superheroes explore places all around the world. The Go Jetters try to fix the Eiffel tower after Grandmaster Glitch breaks it while using it as a TV aerial.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 50
programme.desc: The Go Jetters plan a surprise birthday party for Ubercorn!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S24) - EP 5
programme.desc: When a pretend emergency turns into a real emergency, there's only one engine who can come to save the day.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 4
programme.desc: Sarah is keen to complete her sticker album, so sets off to see if her friends can help.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 3
programme.desc: Sarah and Duck visit the art shop, but arrive early and must entertain themselves.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: Nelly and Nora make rainbows for everyone.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) - EP 35
programme.desc: Pug wants to write exciting stories and our two friends meet Enid Brighton. She has a very vivid imagination and they go an adventure to solve all of her mysteries.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 68
programme.desc: Monty is told off when he behaves like a pig, literally, and decides to roll in the mud. This makes him think about why people can't act like animals.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S3) - EP 36
programme.desc: JoJo is painting a picture but runs out of green paint. It's time for a Gran Gran plan!

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 31
programme.desc: It's time for Bluey and Bingo to get out of the bath. But Dad has decided not to tell them what to do and gets roped into a game of Burger Shop.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 32
programme.desc: Bluey is the ringmaster in a game of circus with her friends, but Hercules wants to play his motorcycle game instead. Luckily, Bluey has a solution to keep everyone happy.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 33
programme.desc: Mum, Dad, and Bingo must complete both their classes to pass swim school, but pleasing strict Big Fish instructor Margaret (aka Bluey) is proving to be very difficult.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 45
programme.desc: After a long walk the squirrels are starting to get tired, a song will help them get home.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 44
programme.desc: Tag stumbles on some toy blocks and hurts his knee. How can they make him feel better?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 43
programme.desc: Outside the clubhouse a large crowd has gathered around a hot air balloon.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 48
programme.desc: The Westman Islands are home to one of the largest colonies of puffins in the world! Once a year puffins return to the land to lay a single egg.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S1) - EP 17
programme.desc: Watermelon performs a body tap routine.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S1) - EP 16
programme.desc: Little artichoke sings about being the rhyming queen.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 20
programme.desc: A toy dinosaur rampages in the Supermarket and scares the Grape Kids. Carrot and Supertato work out that it's controlled by a remote control and get the dinosaur back in its box.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 21

But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 18

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! S1 - EP 25
programme.desc: Based on PD Eastman's classic children’s book, Go, Dog. Go! Follows 6-year-old dog, Tag Barker, on her hilarious adventures in the city of Pawston, a fun-loving community of dogs on the go. Tag is a skilled mechanic and loves anything that goes. With her ingenuity and creativity, Tag can go as far as any plan will take her, always with her best friend, Scooch Pooch, by her side. Scooch’s easy-going nature is the perfect counterbalance to Tag’s high-octane energy.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 23

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: All the farm animals have run away from the farm and are causing chaos in Toy Green. Noddy launches his investigation and discovers that the farm gate was left open by mistake. Using his wwwbook and asking questions, Noddy follows all the clues and discovers that the Pockets left the farm gate open by mistake when they were playing with the animals. With the help of Bumpy, Revs and Big Ears, Noddy soon rounds up all the animals and returns them safely to the farm.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 25
programme.desc: Pat Pat and the pirates have fallen out over who has won board game and as they've lost the rules they can't agree. They both think they are the winner and refuse to talk to one another. Noddy needs to find the missing rules or they might never be friends again! Noddy launches his investigation and asking the who, what, where, when, why and how questions he follows the clues and eventually finds the rules in Smartysaurus's dinolab.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 26
programme.desc: Noddy's back on the case when something goes wrong with Smartysaurus's rainbow experiment . He needs to investigate. He figures out that the rainbow colours have all been put in a different order. Using his investigation kit and all his who, what, why, where, when and how questions he e follows all the clues - which leads him eventually to Fuse's workshop. Fuse admits that he changed the order of the rainbow test tubes from colour to size order.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 23
programme.desc: Maxi is jealous of all of James' gadgets, or more precisely, the attention the other cars give him. He persuades Molecom to devise some gadgets for him… with hilarious results

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 24
programme.desc: Mr Carburettor has commissioned a bust of himself for Silver Hatch. Disaster strikes when it is dropped, Big Chris tries to make amends, while Marsha distracts Mr Carburettor and the reporter

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 25
programme.desc: Breeze and Roary swap places for the day (and night). Roary soon discovers the beach is no place for a racing car to live, while Breeze misses the freedom of the beach.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 26
programme.desc: The cars are all gleaming for this evening's race. Roary gets bored and heads out onto the track - with disastrous consequences. Will the cars be ready in time for the big show?

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 23
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Lion had lost his roar. Crocodile was snapping at all the animals in the Waterhole and Lion opened his big mouth but nothing came out! Tiny Flea tells Lion that if he dares to enter the Great Cave of Tinga Tinga then maybe he will find his roar. Lion plucks up courage and goes into the Great Cave. He roars with all his might, but a bigger roar comes back! Lion stands strong. He roars again and an even bigger roar comes back.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: Zebra was once very easy to spot in Tinga Tinga as he was bright white all over. This very annoying as all he wanted was to be left alone to munch on yummy grass and get fat. One day, Eagle arrives at the Watering Hole with a new pair of sharp talons saying that she found them in the Great Cave. The animals excitedly rush to find something for themselves. Zebra accompanies Tortoise and the Monkeys into the Cave where they discover the last remaining item; a plain black coat.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 25
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Flamingo stood on both legs. One morning, Flamingo and her flock landed at the Water Hole when all the crabs were busy performing their underwater dance. Needless to say, all these legs where in their way! Tortoise came up with the plan that if all Crabs each nipped a flamingo leg, there will be room to share the waterhole. So from then on, Flamingo stood on one legs and Crabs were able to perform their dance in the watering hole

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 26
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Woodpecker didn't peck. All the birds had their very own sound, but Woodpecker didn't make a sound at all.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Kelp is swept by an ocean current to the shore of Unicorn Land where he sees a majestic creature on a cliff that looks just like him, but not like his Narwhal family under the sea. Kelp tells his family he’s a unicorn. / Kelp returns to Unicorn Land where he meets Pixie and Juniper, who show him around and introduce him to unicorn spark and magic.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: When the trees start losing their leaves, Phoebe begins knitting the trees in the park sweaters, but when the neighborhood kids see the sweaters they think they're a mysterious "Yarn Fairy," and they want to see her in action, making it much harder for the Dews to put more sweaters on the latest trees that have lost their leaves.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! S1 - EP 17
programme.desc: When Tip can't solve a homework problem, Oh takes them to the Big Brain Boov; Oh feels he can't "Pook Pook" in front of Tip, creating a gross mix-up.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Feature adaptation of Beatrix Potter's classic tale of a rebellious rabbit trying to sneak into a farmer's vegetable garden.

programme.title: Legally Blonde

programme.title: Aquaman

programme.title: House Of Gucci

programme.title: The Shallows
programme.desc: A surfer finds herself on the feeding ground of a great white shark. Though she is stranded only 200 yards from shore, survival proves to be a test of wills.

programme.title: Watchmen
programme.desc: When one of his former colleagues is murdered, masked vigilante Rorschach sets out to uncover a plot to kill and discredit all superheroes.

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Lady Killers
programme.desc: British crime writer, Martina Cole, examines the life and times of the most notorious female serial killers across history and asks: why do women kill and why are we surprised when they do?

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: The World From Above S2
programme.desc: The second series of The World from Above flies across some of the most beautiful and dramatic places in the world. In this series, we float over Venice, find four US presidents carved into the rock at Mount Rushmore, circle over twenty chateaux in the Loire Valley and fly up the Danube to find an enormous temple dedicated to Valhalla.

programme.title: Hopeful Earth
programme.desc: This series travels around the world to meet the people who create the energies of tomorrow through unusual ideas. An extraordinary journey in 8 different countries to unearth imaginative solutions to the present energy and environmental issues.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: Travel Track
programme.desc: Travel Track, a series of honest-to-goodness, self-guided trips in Korea's hidden travel destination. Four individuals with fantastic chemistry from a team to experience and introduce each destination's local experiences, cuisine, and attractions.

programme.title: Travel Agency 2
programme.desc: Global content creators from all around the world will create a brand new map, introducing every inch of Korea. The lively energy and vivid reactions shown by our Creators will let you feel like you are actualy eating, seeing, and experiencing the dynamic regional wonders. Also, these Creators will broadcast and share their trip LIVE in their individual channels.

programme.title: Earth On Edge
programme.desc: Documentary series about the climate crisis. We travel to Iceland, Greenland, Denmark, Japan and California to explore the effects of a warming planet. While the situation is dire, there is hope. Brilliant minds are coming up with solutions that could show us a new way. As we stand on the edge, what is our next step?

programme.title: Ruang Makna
programme.desc: A program that discusses the meaning of words that are often heard and used every day in the context of life. Presented concisely and easy to understand.

programme.title: Sea Morning Show (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Morning Show delivers up to-date news, live reports, talk shows and features about Indonesia and also Southeast Asia which airs daily 6 - 9 am.

programme.title: Knock The Doc
programme.desc: Talkshow about big issues of human health (both mental and physical) and beauty.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.title: The Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Shot on location with stunning cinematography, The Wild Bunch offers an intimate insight into Africa's most threatened species. Travelling across South Africa, through wild bush, high grassland and arid mountaintops, each episode is freestanding; focusing on the challenges or conflicts of a particular animal.

programme.title: Factory Story
programme.desc: Food or goods that we encounter in everyday life without us realizing it go through a long process. Machines and hands that work hard behind the manufacture of a food, drink or goods are the main factors for the success of a product

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: Tough Boats
programme.desc: A brand new series that explores some of the most fascinating and hard-core boat journeys on the planet. In this mini series we undertake epic journeys by boats in some of the toughest environments on earth. During our journeys we look at how the technology of boat travel has been adapted to survive, trade with and connect isolated communities.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Travel Quest is an eco travel adventure series showcasing some of the most exciting, exotic and often dangerous places in earth Host Bill Ball, a true " challenges himself in each episode as he attempts to check an adventure, thrill or rare animal off his personal bucket list Tracking jaguars, diving with sharks, climbing cliffs in Africa, photographing gorillas, bicycling across the Serengeti and finding cannibals on remote and forbidden islands are all part of his Travel Quest

programme.title: Epic Trails
programme.desc: Epic Trails is a visually stunning and inspiring television series that follows wilderness adventurer, Eric Hanson, on his journey to discover the world's most amazing trails Each 30 minute episode follows Eric on one of his world travels taking viewers on breathtaking adventures while sharing unique stories of the places and the people Eric encounters along the way

programme.title: Sustainable Living
programme.desc: Providing inspiration that there is a different "Way of life". Some call it slow living, living off-grid. However, in this show, we describe it as self sustainable living. Providing inspiration to the audience that shows how lucky the Indonesian people are to live in a very generous land.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Green Living
programme.desc: Green Living is a program explores the life of gardening, both small and large scale. Gardening isa fun thing and can be a promising profession. Planters usually own large areas of land, and have patterns and ways to develop their natural products. They will then sell these natural products, in a simple way, which is beneficial for all people.

programme.title: 3-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 3 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 4 - 7 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: Hungry Hour
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: Finding Dish
programme.desc: Program contains light information about the world of health and food combining

programme.title: Stories Of Taste
programme.desc: Stories of Taste will provide a new perspective about the taste of unique cuisines across the cities in Indonesia. Take an in-depth look at the struggles and history of the owners in building and creating great food or restaurants.

programme.title: The Meat And Greed
programme.desc: The food show that is a carnivore's delight, Meat & Greed is back for a sumptuous season 2! Join us on a savoury food crawl as we hunt down the best and tastiest meat dishes Singapore has to offer; sizzling charcoal barbecues, fork tender smoked beef briskets, succulent flamegrilled chicken, crispy whole roast pig, juicy handmade burgers, delectable steamed seafood and much more! In this flavourful protein-packed series, you know you will be getting the lion's share.

programme.title: Podsea
programme.desc: A podcast program where we talk to someone famous in the past. We do little throwbacks about a certain period of time, talk about music, movies, or trends that were happening in the past, to reminisce about some memorable old stories.

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Lady Killers
programme.desc: British crime writer, Martina Cole, examines the life and times of the most notorious female serial killers across history and asks: why do women kill and why are we surprised when they do?

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: The World From Above S2
programme.desc: The second series of The World from Above flies across some of the most beautiful and dramatic places in the world. In this series, we float over Venice, find four US presidents carved into the rock at Mount Rushmore, circle over twenty chateaux in the Loire Valley and fly up the Danube to find an enormous temple dedicated to Valhalla.

programme.title: Hopeful Earth
programme.desc: This series travels around the world to meet the people who create the energies of tomorrow through unusual ideas. An extraordinary journey in 8 different countries to unearth imaginative solutions to the present energy and environmental issues.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: Trail Town: Down Under
programme.desc: This family-friendly travel show is dedicated to cycling and the great outdoors, and to encouraging more families, couples and friends to explore the world on bicycle.Jump on for the ride of a lifetime as we explore the cycle trails, mountain bike parks, natural beauty and cuisine that Australia and New Zealand has to offer.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Earth On Edge
programme.desc: Documentary series about the climate crisis. We travel to Iceland, Greenland, Denmark, Japan and California to explore the effects of a warming planet. While the situation is dire, there is hope. Brilliant minds are coming up with solutions that could show us a new way. As we stand on the edge, what is our next step?

programme.title: Ruang Makna
programme.desc: A program that discusses the meaning of words that are often heard and used every day in the context of life. Presented concisely and easy to understand.

programme.title: Sea Morning Show (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Morning Show delivers up to-date news, live reports, talk shows and features about Indonesia and also Southeast Asia which airs daily 6 - 9 am.

programme.title: Satisfactory
programme.desc: Satisfactory means fulfilling expectations or needs; acceptable, though not outstanding or perfect. Is a cooking program that will present a healthy, special, and filling menu suitable for breaking the fast. Guided by an interactive and excellent host in preparing home-cooked meals, so that the audience can easily do it at home.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Star Life
programme.desc: A high-energy infotainment program that seamlessly blends the latest from the global celebrity landscape with the hottest local Indonesian stars and social media influencers. The show's mission is to dissect and serve up all things trendy and zeitgeisty, ensuring a rollercoaster ride of entertainment and information.

programme.title: All About Women
programme.desc: This program is a kind of story rubric that is a friend to women, especially in Indonesia and Southeast Asia in general. The program will inspire women associated with their passion for hobbies, fashion, makeup, beauty and health, astrology, and events. There will still be a part of the local wisdom but adjusted to the coverage.

programme.title: Space Of Mine
programme.desc: Everyone dreams of having a dream home. A dream home doesn't have to be big and grand, but the most important thing is that it is comfortable and fits the owner's personality. This program will provide inspiration from people's stories about their unique homes.

programme.title: The Travel Note
programme.desc: The Travel Note is a light travel program that discusses about tourist attractions, which includes history, culture, variety culinary there and also the comfortable and affordable hotel. Presented by a young, attractive and dynamic host. The Travel Note also provides some tips and tricks to the audiences.

programme.title: The $100 Nomad
programme.desc: Got a weekend, an adventurous spirit and a hundred dollars? We fly Xenia, Fauzi and Zhin to 10 unexplored destinations with only $100 for food, activities and lodging. By chasing unreal landscapes and spending nights at unlikely abodes where no tourists go, the $100 nomads prove that budget stands in no way of a grand adventure.

programme.title: Factory Story
programme.desc: Food or goods that we encounter in everyday life without us realizing it go through a long process. Machines and hands that work hard behind the manufacture of a food, drink or goods are the main factors for the success of a product

programme.title: Beyond The Barn
programme.desc: Beyond The Barn wants the program to invite the audience to look beyond traditional livestock farming, by highlighting the business potential that can be generated. For example, cowhide produced from the farm can be used as raw material for leather shoes, showing how creativity can turn agricultural or livestock products into profitable businesses.

programme.title: Wild Cage
programme.desc: Indonesia's wildlife is incredibly diverse, with a variety of unique and spectacular wildlife living in Indonesia. Indonesia is home to many endemic species, and the existence of these endemic species is very important and part of our identity, as all creatures play an important role in maintaining the balance of Indonesia's wild ecosystems.

programme.title: Wild Things
programme.desc: Our landscape has changed dramatically over the last 50 years.Wild plants, bushes and trees have disappeared, and strange new plants have become familiar.With big, bold experiments and innovative approaches this series offers a colourful and engaging window onto our natural environment and reveals what the future may hold for biodiversity everywhere.

programme.title: Dingo Untamed
programme.desc: Dingo is an award winning Discovery Channel and YouTube Wildlife conservationist and adventurer whose various social media platform reach in excess of 200 million viewers every year. Through these videos, Dingo actively strives to create a lasting connection between people and animals in the hope that this connection can in turn help to save them.

programme.title: The Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Shot on location with stunning cinematography, The Wild Bunch offers an intimate insight into Africa's most threatened species. Travelling across South Africa, through wild bush, high grassland and arid mountaintops, each episode is freestanding; focusing on the challenges or conflicts of a particular animal.

programme.title: Fanatic
programme.desc: Great love and admiration for something can be an interesting story to talk about.

programme.title: Asian Art Stories
programme.desc: Asian Art Stories profiles 18 diverse Asian-origin artists across Fine Arts, Music, Dance, Theatre, Multimedia and Design. Weaving together personal stories and artistic practices through different perspectives, this series explores how life in Aotearoa New Zealand informs their work and sense of cultural identity.

programme.title: Indonesia Art Talk
programme.desc: A program that will show the artwork of every talented artist with all the achievements obtained. extraordinary work will amaze the audience.

programme.title: 3-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 3 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 4 - 7 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: Sportlite
programme.desc: Find the history and unique story in every sport branches with Sportlite.

programme.title: Teman Bicara
programme.desc: Maman Suherman or usually called "Kang Maman" wants to share stories with his inspirational friends that can motivate people to be successful.

programme.title: Beyond The Barn

programme.desc: The journey of 3 (three) different individuals participating in the World Major Marathon.

The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xin’s very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: Americas Now
programme.desc: Americas Now profiles the development, diversity and challenges facing the Americas, particularly Latin America. The strength of the program is its storytelling. Correspondents across the region present insightful, well-researched and engaging narratives. Americas Now is a compelling, authoritative and balanced voice from the region, giving CGTN a competitive edge in the North American media market.

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: The Heat is a daily talk show anchored from Washington, D.C. It focuses on top stories making news globally. The Heat presents tough issues from a comprehensive, balanced and international and Chinese perspective. Guests from on the spot and around the world ensure lively debate and a range of voices. Wherever the story is happening, The Heat is there.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTN’s studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the country’s business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment "Global Debate".

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues. programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China’s perspective, policies and stories. The program, relying on global reporting resources, presents in-depth analysis and coverage of major global issues, from a Chinese perspective on international affairs. The program presents to-the-point interpretation of Chinese policies and stories that are of interest to foreign audiences, in a style they are familiar with.

programme.title: Big Story
programme.desc: Big Story is a documentary film program on CGTN. It explores global events with in a variety of filmic styles and featuring original, in-depth, thought-provoking storytelling. The program provides a unique platform for the best current affairs documentaries from around the globe. Big Story aims to present the contemporary world and China’s global perspectives on the contemporary world to an international audience.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. programme.desc: Brimming with nostalgia, flavours and stories from the countryside, "Fields and Feasts" depicts the tales of digging up, inheriting, and re-creating these delicacies by hidden countryside creators through the lens of the camera, serving up an array of nostalgic and flavourful memories.

programme.title: Lost You Forever Season 2 - EP 22
programme.desc: Wandering in Dahuang, Xiao Yao loses her identity and settles in Qingshui Town as Wen Xiao Liu. She meets Prince Qiang Xuan, Tu Shan Jing, Xiang Liu, A Nian, Chi Shui Feng Long and gets intertwined in a story of kinship, love, and friendship.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1817
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Strange Tales of Tang Dynasty II - To The West - EP 18
programme.desc: Set during Tang Dynasty's peak, the sequel follows Lu Lingfeng (Yang Xuwen), head of the Dali Temple, and Su Wuming (Yang Zhigang), a Qianling official as they leave Chang'an for the west on a fearless journey to unravel mysterious cases amid lurking dangers.

programme.title: Strange Tales of Tang Dynasty II - To The West - EP 19
programme.desc: Set during Tang Dynasty's peak, the sequel follows Lu Lingfeng (Yang Xuwen), head of the Dali Temple, and Su Wuming (Yang Zhigang), a Qianling official as they leave Chang'an for the west on a fearless journey to unravel mysterious cases amid lurking dangers.

programme.title: Stand By Me - EP 43
programme.desc: The story tells the fateful reunion of twin sisters Cheng Ruo Yu and Qiu Yan Zhi as they become involved in political affairs upon encountering the young Emperor Li Yan.

programme.title: Side Story Of Fox Volant - EP 20
programme.desc: Hu Fei steps up to avenge his father's death, transforming from a brave, reckless teen into a hero among his generation, caring about the common people and serving communities all across the country. However, things get complicated when he falls for that same warlord's daughter, the stunning Yuan Zi Yi.

programme.title: Side Story Of Fox Volant - EP 21

programme.title: No Room for Crime - EP 18

programme.title: Your Honor - EP 3
programme.desc: Judge Song Pan Ho, an upholder of justice, and Kim Gang Heon, a ruthless gang boss, are two fathers whose lives spiral into chaos when their sons are involved in a life-altering accident. Their contrasting worlds collide, pushing them to the brink.

programme.title: The Escape of the Seven: Resurrection - EP 5
programme.desc: Do Hyuk returns from the dead seeking revenge after being framed as a murderer. The seven wicked associates regroup for a renewed game of vengeance. Some seek revenge, others power, and some conceal their true motives in a new game of deceit and betrayal. How will the fates of the Seven reborn from lies end?

programme.title: As Beautiful As You - EP 16
programme.desc: Ji Xing (Tan Song Yun), refuses to endure the stifling corporate grind, she quits her job to embark on a challenging entrepreneurial journey and eventually secures the investment of Han Ting (Xu Kai). Together, they advance in the medical and health industry.

programme.title: As Beautiful As You - EP 17
programme.desc: Ji Xing (Tan Song Yun), refuses to endure the stifling corporate grind, she quits her job to embark on a challenging entrepreneurial journey and eventually secures the investment of Han Ting (Xu Kai). Together, they advance in the medical and health industry.

programme.title: As Beautiful As You - EP 18
programme.desc: Ji Xing (Tan Song Yun), refuses to endure the stifling corporate grind, she quits her job to embark on a challenging entrepreneurial journey and eventually secures the investment of Han Ting (Xu Kai). Together, they advance in the medical and health industry.

programme.title: As Beautiful As You - EP 19
programme.desc: Ji Xing (Tan Song Yun), refuses to endure the stifling corporate grind, she quits her job to embark on a challenging entrepreneurial journey and eventually secures the investment of Han Ting (Xu Kai). Together, they advance in the medical and health industry.

programme.title: Your Honor - EP 4
programme.desc: Judge Song Pan Ho, an upholder of justice, and Kim Gang Heon, a ruthless gang boss, are two fathers whose lives spiral into chaos when their sons are involved in a life-altering accident. Their contrasting worlds collide, pushing them to the brink.

programme.title: The Escape of the Seven: Resurrection - EP 6
programme.desc: Do Hyuk returns from the dead seeking revenge after being framed as a murderer. The seven wicked associates regroup for a renewed game of vengeance. Some seek revenge, others power, and some conceal their true motives in a new game of deceit and betrayal. How will the fates of the Seven reborn from lies end?

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1619
programme.desc: HUNG SHU-KAN (Lau Dan) built his own logistics business from scratch and now everything is in order. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, HUNG YUEK-SHUI (Koni Lui), is still single. She and her little prodigy sister, HUNG SUM-YUE (Andrea So), often fight over small things, putting their father in dilemmas.

programme.title: Bounty Lady - EP 4
programme.desc: Leading Public Affairs Expert HEUNG KWONG-NAM (Dayo Wong), a renowned savior of the bachelorettes in town, often helps his single female clients have a happy marriage by using unexpected methods, yet he himself remains single and is satisfied with short-term relationships.

programme.title: Kids' Lives Matter - EP 9
programme.desc: Rewind twenty years and an operation causes pediatric trainees Fong Chung-yan (Kenneth Ma) and Hui Kam-fung (Kevin Cheng) to become foes. Fast-forward to the present and Chung-yan is a consultant pediatric surgeon at a top hospital. He and Kam-fung, who is employed by a second-tier hospital, meet up again due to a liver transplant operation. Chung-yan coaxes Kam-fung into joining his elite team.

programme.title: Legend of the Condor Heroes (I), The - EP 19
programme.desc: This costume Kung -fu-packed serialized drama is an authentic adaptation of the most selling Kung-fu novel by the well renowned novelist KAM YUNG. This long-series has been divided into 3 parts, each of these evolves around individual story lines and denotes a separate phase. Every part is complete in itself, yet, together they form a coherent whole._x000D_The story is set in the Sung Dynasty, when the KAM and YEUN monarchy are both invading South._x000D_YEUNG and KWOK are two sworn brothers.

programme.title: Virtues of Harmony II - EP 83
programme.desc: In the early 1980s’, everyone knows about GUCCI (SIT KA YIN, NANCY). She was the most beautiful woman in the police force and many men were after her. After getting married, GUCCI took good care of her family, especially after her husband died. She brought up her step-sons, NIN (LAM MAN LUNG, FRANKIE) and YUE (TSE TIN WAH, MICHAEL), and step-daughter, YAT (CHAN YIN HANG, JOYCE). She also manages the restaurant, ‘Honey Cave’, which her husband has left her.

programme.title: Anti-Crime Squad - EP 18
programme.desc: HEY (Ng Ngai Cheung) is a member of the Anti-crime Squad. Being a stubborn man with determination to fight crime, he never gives way to criminals. He is so competent that he has solved many difficult cases. However he is not good at working with others and his strong character has laid an iron curtain between he and his colleagues. He is not accepted by his Supervisor FAN (Lai Yiu Cheung) and new partner HONG (Chan Ho Man, Benny). Being unable to hind support, HEY wants to quit his job.

programme.title: Last Breakthrough, The - EP 1
programme.desc: Dr. WONG PO FUN (CHEUNG KA FAI, NICK) joins "Life Force", an international medical humanitarian organization, to carry out the unfulfilled wish of his deceased girlfriend, TUNG (LEUNG WING KEI, GIGI). He also sets up "Lung Shing Medical Centre" to help the poor. _x000D__x000D_ When FUN is working with the organization in Kenya, he meets a young doctor called CHAI PAK HANG (LAM, RAYMOND), who works at a private hospital named "Ling Siu" in Hong Kong.
